Verses: 1 avar Avvidam Vittezhundhu, Yordhaanukku Akkaraiyilulla Dhesaththin Vazhiyaai Yoodheyaavin Ellaigalil Vandhaar. Janangal Marupadiyum Avaridaththil Koodivandhaargal. Avar Thammudaiya Vazhakkaththinpadiye Marupadiyum Avargalukkup Podhagampanninaar.
2 appozhudhu, Pariseyar Avarai Sothikkavendumendru, Avaridaththil Vandhu: Purushanaanavan Than Manaiviyaith Thallividuvadhu Niyaayamaa Endru Kettaargal.
3 avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Mose Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyittirukkiradhu Enna Endru Kettaar.
4 adharku Avargal: Thalludharseettaikkoduththu, Avalaith Thallividalaamendru Mose Uththaravukoduththirukkiraar Endraargal.
5 yesu Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Ungal Irudhayakadinaththinimiththam Indhak Kattalaiyai Ungalukku Ezhudhikkoduththaan.
6 aagilum, Aadhiyile Manusharai Sirushtiththa Dhevan Avargalai Aanum Pennumaaga Undaakkinaar.
7 idhinimiththam Purushanaanavan Than Thagappanaiyum Thaayaiyum Vittuth Than Manaiviyode Isaindhiruppaan;
8 avargal Iruvarum Ore Maamsamaayiruppaargal; Ivvidhamaai Avargal Iruvaraayiraamal Ore Maamsamaayirukkiraargal.
9 aagaiyaal Dhevan Inaiththadhai Manushan Pirikkaadhirukkakkadavan Endraar.
10 pinbu Veettile Avarudaiya Seeshargal Andhak Kaariyaththaikkuriththu Marupadiyum Avaridaththil Visaariththaargal.
11 appozhudhu Avar: Evanaagilum Than Manaiviyaith Thallivittu, Veroruththiyai Vivaagampanninaal, Avan Avalukku Virodhamaai Vibasaaranjeygiravanaayiruppaan;
12 manaiviyum Than Purushanaith Thallivittu, Veroruvanai Vivaagampanninaal, Vibasaaranjeygiravalaayiruppaal Endraar.
13 appozhudhu, Siru Pillaigalai Avar Thodumpadikku Avargalai Avaridaththil Konduvandhaargal; Konduvandhavargalai Seeshargal Adhattinaargal.
14 yesu Adhaikkandu Visanamadaindhu: Siru Pillaigal Ennidaththil Varugiradharku Idankodungal; Avargalaith Thadaipannaadhirungal; Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Appadippattavargaludaiyadhu.
15 evanaagilum Siru Pillaiyaippol Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththai Etrukkollaavittaal, Avan Adhil Piravesippadhillaiyendru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endru Solli,
16 avargalai Anaiththukkondu, Avargalmel Kaigalai Vaiththu, Avargalai Aaseervadhiththaar.

17 pinbu, Avar Purappattu Vazhiyile Pogaiyil, Oruvan Odivandhu, Avarukku Munbaaga Muzhangaalpadiyittu: Nalla Podhagare Niththiya Jeevanai Sudhandhariththukkollumpadi Naan Ennaseyyavendum Endru Kettaan;
18 adharku Yesu: Nee Ennai Nallavan Endru Solvaanen? Dhevan Oruvar Thavira Nallavan Oruvanumillaiye;

19 vibasaaranjeyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Kolai Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Kalavu Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Poisaatchi Sollaadhiruppaayaaga, Vanjanai Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Un Thagappanaiyum Un Thaayaiyum Ganampannuvaayaaga Engira Karpanaigalai Arindhirukkiraaye Endraar.
20 adharku Avan: Podhagare, Ivaigalaiyellaam En Siru Vayadhumudhal Kaikkondirukkiren Endraan.

21 yesu Avanaip Paarththu, Avanidaththil Anbukoorndhu: Unnidaththil Oru Kuraivu Undu; Nee Poi, Unakku Undaanavaigalaiyellaam Vitru, Thariththirarukkuk Kodu, Appozhudhu Paralogaththile Unakkup Pokkisham Undaayirukkum; Pinbu Siluvaiyai Eduththukkondu Ennaip Pinbatrivaa Endraar.
22 avan Migundha Aasthiyullavanaayirundhapadiyaal, Indha Vaarththaiyaik Kettu, Manamadinthu, Dhukkaththode Poivittaan.
23 appozhudhu Yesu Sutrippaarththu, Thammudaiya Seesharai Nokki: Aisuvariyamullavargal Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Piravesikkiradhu Evvalavu Aridhaayirukkiradhu Endraar.

24 seeshargal Avarudaiya Vaarththaigalaikkuriththu Aachchariyappattaargal. Yesu Pinnum Avargalai Nokki: Pillaigale, Aisuvariyaththinmel Nambikkaiyaayirukkiravargal Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Piravesippadhu Evvalavu Aridhaayirukkiradhu!
25 aisuvariyavaan Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Piravesippadhaippaarkkilum, Ottagamaanadhu Oosiyin Kaadhile Nuzhaivadhu Elidhaayirukkum Endraar.
26 avargal Pinnum Adhigamaai Aachchariyappattu: Appadiyaanaal Yaar Ratchikkappadakkoodum Endru Thangalukkule Sollikkondaargal.
27 yesu Avargalaip Paarththu: Manusharaal Idhu Koodaadhadhudhaan; Dhevanaal Idhu Koodaadhadhalla; Dhevanaale Ellaam Koodum Endraar.
28 appozhudhu Pedhuru Avarai Nokki: Idho, Naangal Ellaavatraiyum Vittu, Ummaip Pinbatrinome, Endru Sollaththodanginaan.

29 adharku Yesu Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Ennimiththimaagavum, Suviseshaththinimiththamaagavum, Veettaiyaavadhu, Sagodhararaiyaavadhu, Sagodharigalaiyaavadhu, Thagappanaiyaavadhu, Thaayaiyaavadhu, Manaiviyaiyaavadhu, Pillaigalaiyaavadhu, Nilangalaiyaavadhu Vitthavan Evanum,

30 ippozhudhu Immaiyile, Thunbangalodekooda Nooraththanaiyaaga, Veedugalaiyum, Sagodhararaiyum, Sagodharigalaiyum, Thaaigalaiyum, Pillaigalaiyum, Nilangalaiyum, Marumaiyile Niththiya Jeevanaiyum Adaivaan Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
31 aagilum Mundhinor Anegar Pindhinoraayum, Pindhinor Anegar Mundhinoraayum Iruppaargal Endraar.

32 pinbu Avargal Erusalemukkup Pirayaanamaaippogaiyil, Yesu Avargalukku Munne Nadandhu Ponaar; Avargal Thigaiththu, Avarukkup Pinne, Bayaththode Ponaargal. Appozhudhu Avar Panniruvaraiyum Azhaiththu, Thamakku Sambavikkappogiravaigalai Avargalukku Marupadiyum Sollaththodanginaar:

33  Idho, Erusalemukkuppogirom; Ange Manushakumaaran Piradhaana Aasaariyaridaththilum Vedhapaaragaridaththilum Oppukkodukkappaduvaar; Avargal Avarai Marana Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerththu, Puraththesaththaaridaththil Oppukkoduppaargal.
34 avargal Avaraip Pariyaasampanni, Avarai Vaarinaal Adiththu, Avarmel Thuppi, Avaraik Kolaiseyvaargal; Aagilum Moondraam Naalile Avar Uyirode Ezhundhiruppaar Endraar.
35 appozhudhu Sebedheyuvin Kumaararaagiya Yaakkobum Yovaanum Avaridaththil Vandhu: Podhagare, Naangal Kettukkollappogiradhai Neer Engalukku Seyyavendumendru Virumbugirom Endraargal.
36 avar Avargalai Nokki: Naan Ungalukku Ennaseyyavendumendru Virumpugireergal Endru Kettaar.
37 adharku Avargal: Umadhu Magimaiyile, Engalil Oruvan Umadhu Valadhu Paarisaththilum, Oruvan Umadhu Idadhupaarisaththilum Utkaarndhirukkumpadi Arul Seyyavendum Endraargal.

38 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Kettukkollugiradhu Innadhu Endru Ungalukke Theriyavillai. Naan Kudikkum Paaththiraththil Neengal Kudikkavum, Naan Perum Snaanaththai Neengal Peravum, Ungalaal Koodumaa Endraar.
39 adharku Avargal: Koodum Endraargal. Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Naan Kudikkum Paaththiraththil Neengal Kudippeergal, Naan Perum Snaanaththaiyum Neengal Peruveergal.

40 aanaalum En Valadhu Paarisaththilum En Idadhu Paarisaththilum Utkaarndhirukkumpadi Evargalukku Aayaththampannappattirukkiradho Avargalukkeyallaamal, Matroruvarukkum Adhai Aruluvadhu En Kaariyamalla Endraar.
41 matrap Paththupperum Adhaikkettu, Yaakkobin Melum Yovaanin Melum Erichchalaanaargal.

42 appozhudhu, Yesu Avargalaik Kittavarachseydhu: Purajaadhiyaarukku Adhigaarigalaaga Ennappattavargal Avargalai Irumaappaai Aalugiraargal Endrum, Avargalil Periyavargal Avargal Mel Kadinamaai Adhigaaram Seluththugiraargal Endrum, Neengal Arindhirukkireergal.
43 ungalukkulle Appadi Irukkalaagaadhu; Ungalil Evanaagilum Periyavanaayirukka Virumbinaal, Avan Ungalukkup Panividaikkaaranaayirukkakkadavan.
44 ungalil Evanaagilum Mudhanmaiyaanavanaayirukka Virumbinaal, Avan Ellaarukkum Oozhiyakkaaranaayirukkakkadavan.
45 appadiye, Manushakumaaranum Oozhiyankollumpadi Varaamal, Oozhiyanjeyyavum, Anegarai Meetkumporulaagath Thammudaiya Jeevanaikkodukkavum Vandhaar Endraar.

46 pinbu Avargal Erigovukku Vandhaargal. Avarum Avarudaiya Seeshargalum Thiralaana Janangalum Erigovaivittup Purappadugirapodhu, Thimeyuvin Maganaagiya Parthimeyu Engira Oru Kurudan, Vazhiyaruge Utkaarndhu, Pichchai Kettukkondirundhaan.
47 avan Nasareyanaagiya Yesu Varugiraarendru Kelvippattu: Yesuve, Thaaveedhin Kumaarane, Enakku Irangum Endru Kooppidaththodanginaan.
48 avan Pesaadhirukkumpadi Anegar Avanai Adhattinaargal. Avano: Thaaveedhin Kumaarane, Enakku Irangum Endru Munnilum Adhigamaaik Kooppittaan.
49 yesu Nindru, Avanai Azhaiththu Varachsonnaar. Avargal Andhak Kurudanai Azhaiththu: Thidankol, Ezhundhiru, Unnai Azhaikkiraar Endraargal.
50 udane Avan Than Mel Vasthiraththai Erindhuvittu, Ezhundhu, Yesuvinidaththil Vandhaan.
51 yesu Avanai Nokki: Naan Unakku Ennaseyyavendum Endrirukkiraai Endraar. Adharku Andhak Kurudan: Aandavare, Naan Paarvaiyadaiyavendum Endraan.
52 yesu Avanai Nokki: Nee Pogalaam, Un Visuvaasam Unnai Ratchiththadhu Endraar. Udane Avan Paarvaiyadaindhu, Vazhiyile Yesuvukkup Pinsendraan.
